bibl.title: The Archive of Kyri(a)kos "diakonos kai elaioprates".
bibl.note: Publishes two texts newly discovered in the papyrus collection of the Louvre (Paris) and corrects some already published texts of the archive: S.P.P. VIII, 898; 899; 906; 909; 910; 912; 913; 915; 919; 922; 924; 925; 926; 931; 932; 933; 936; 939; 944.
Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, The Archive of Kyri(a)kos "diakonos kai elaioprates".
141.4 P. Paris Louvre Inv. 6522; 6614 145.4 S.P.P. VIII
